abstract: Although Potash shareholders are betting BHP will raise its $38.6 billion offer, it is unclear whether anyone has the ability and interest to top BHP’s bid.
snippet: Although Potash shareholders are betting BHP will raise its $38.6 billion offer, it is unclear whether anyone has the ability and interest to top BHP’s bid.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA  Less than 24 hours after being bluntly rebuffed by the board of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, BHP Billiton took its $38.6 billion offer directly to shareholders on Wednesday.

abstract: If BHP Billiton is successful in its bid to acquire Potash, the company intends to pull out of Canpotex, the group that controls overseas exports of Canadian potash, The Globe and Mail reported.
